name: Hell Gates
description:
Hell gates is a fast-paced shooter that places you in an arena to fight endless spawns of demons. You are armed with a shotgun and a pistol which you have to use for stay alive as long as you can. 

Hell gates takes inspiration from the classic 90's 2.5D shooters like DOOM with added ability to rewind time. When you rewind time it takes you back 10 seconds in the past which lets you avoid enemies , choose alternative routes , aim your shots better etc but you have to sacrifice 100 points in order to able able to do it. 

Gameplay Features:
  • 2 types of enemies (shooter and exploding)
  • Earn score which you can spend to rewind back in time
  • Pistol has unlimited ammo, Shotgun max ammo 50
  • Medkits and Ammo drops  from sky at random
  • Feel like a bad ass as you slaughter endless hordes of your victims  demons.
  • High Score for the competitive gamers
Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look and aim
  • Left click to shoot
  • Scroll wheel to alternate between weapons or 1 and 2 number keys
  • R to rewind back in time (up to 10 seconds)
  • Escape to pause/resume 
  • Delete key to delete save data while in game.
